mapper.name: Udemy Onboarding - {{{{33.`0`}}}} {{{{33.`1`}}}}
mapper.content:
Welcome to the Udemy instructor community {{33.`1`}} {{33.`1`}}!

This document is your step‑by‑step guide to the automated onboarding journey that begins as soon as your status is updated to “Approved” in our HR system on {{33.`5`}}. As a {{33.`3`}} joining our instructor team, you will move through a streamlined process designed to handle the administrative work for you so you can focus on creating exceptional learning experiences.

Your onboarding starts with formalizing our partnership. A personalized instructor agreement is generated for you using a secure Google Docs template and sent to{{33.`2`}} for electronic signature via DocuSign. At the same time, our internal team is notified so they can monitor the process and support you as needed. Signing this agreement promptly is the key to unlocking the next steps in your onboarding.

Once your contract is signed, our systems begin setting you up for success by activating your core accounts and tools. An instructor account is created for you in our Learning Management System, giving you access to course‑building features and resources. A payout profile is configured for you in Stripe so you can receive course payments smoothly and on time. You are also provided with a dedicated folder in Google Drive to organize your course materials, lesson plans, and other essential resources.

As your accounts come online, we also focus on communication and ongoing support. You will receive an official welcome email from Udemy at {{33.`2`}} that summarizes your next steps and shares helpful links. At the same time, a profile for you is created in our internal CRM so we can keep track of your teaching focus and share relevant opportunities, platform updates, and best practices tailored to your goals.

Your automated onboarding can be summarized in three main stages: completing your contract, activating your account setup, and receiving our official communications. Your first and most important action is to locate the email from DocuSign in your inbox and sign your instructor agreement. Once that is complete, our partnership officially begins, and we look forward to supporting you as you build and deliver impactful learning experiences on Udemy.

mapper.emailBlurb:
Hi {{33.`0`}} {{33.`1`}},

Welcome to the Udemy Instructor Program!

Please review and sign your Instructor Agreement. If you have any questions, reply to this email and our team will assist you.

Thank you,
Udemy Team

mapper.html:
Hi  {{33.`0`}} {{33.`1`}}

Welcome to the Udemy Instructor Program!

Your onboarding packet has been submitted and is now ready for your review.

Please check your email for:
1. Your Google Doc onboarding file  
2. Your DocuSign Instructor Agreement  
3. Your CanvasLMS login credentials 
4. You will receive a separate email from Canvas with access to the Udemy Instructor Onboarding Course. 

If you have any questions, reply to this email and our team will support you right away.

Thank you,  
Udemy Team
mapper.subject: Welcome to Udemy Instructor Onboarding

notes.content: Canvas sandbox environment isn’t provisioned, so this route logs the error and continues. In a real deployment, this same module would create the instructor account in Canvas via API.
